name: sprout-space
description: A MERN stack Web App for planning a garden plot.

scripts.dev: npm i && npm run build && npm run start:dev
scripts.start: npm run client:build && npm run server
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "npm run server:dev" "wait-on tcp:3001 && npm run client:dev"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
scripts.build: npm run server:build && npm run client:build
scripts.render-build: npm install --production=false && npm run server:build && npm run client:build
